page.title: 11OUR WEEKENDS IN CALOW
page.content: There are not many things to do in Calow at the weekend.There are 2 parks with swings,slide and roundabout.At the Church Hall on Saturday afternoon there is the Junior Fellowship,where you can play snooker,table tennis, chess or other board games.There is boxing at the Activity Centre,but nothing for the girls. There are no large supermarkets,stores or markets to visit.We must travel 2 miles to Chesterfield to do these things and if we want to go swimming, dancing,to watch football,or visit a cinema or theatre.We have to go out of Calow to the nearest riding stable, B.M.X. Track and library.
